name: Rabbit Riot
description:
Rabbit Riot is a Horror game. Help the bunny get home! On his way there will be terrible wolves and ghosts, but relying on his dexterity the rabbit to overcome this difficult path. The old Olion estate was a very gloomy place before that, all the inhabitants of the area bypassed it because there are legends that the scientist living there was mad before and conducted experiments on moving a man into a rabbit. History is silent about how the experiments were carried out and how they ended, but one day the situation changed dramatically.

Key features:
-Beautiful graphics
-Dynamic gameplay
- light music;
